title: 游댮 CRITICAL: Port 8000 Already in Use - Server Fails to Start
body:
## Problem Description
The FastAPI server fails to start because port 8000 is already in use. This prevents local development and testing.

```
ERROR: [Errno 48] error while attempting to bind on address ('0.0.0.0', 8000): address already in use
```

## Current Impact
- Cannot run server locally for development
- Blocks testing of new features
- Forces manual port changes each time

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement dynamic port allocation
- [ ] Add port conflict detection
- [ ] Support PORT environment variable
- [ ] Add --port CLI argument support
- [ ] Document port configuration options

## Definition of Done
- Server starts reliably without port conflicts
- Port configurable via environment and CLI
- Clear error messages when ports unavailable
- Documentation updated

## Relevant Files
- `main.py` (line ~1560 - uvicorn.run)
- `README.md` (add port configuration docs)

**Time Estimate:** 2-4 hours

title: 游댮 CRITICAL: PostgreSQL Connection Fails - SQLite Fallback Issues
body:
## Problem Description
PostgreSQL connection consistently fails with DNS errors, forcing SQLite fallback which may not scale for production.

```
WARNING: 丘멆잺 PostgreSQL connection failed: [Errno 8] nodename nor servname provided, or not known
```

## Current Impact
- Production database not accessible
- Using SQLite limits scalability
- Data may be split between databases
- Analytics queries may be slower

## Root Cause Analysis
- DATABASE_URL appears malformed or DNS issue
- Connection pooling may be misconfigured
- Railway environment variables not loading correctly

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Fix PostgreSQL connection string parsing
- [ ] Add connection retry logic with backoff
- [ ] Implement proper connection pooling
- [ ] Add database health monitoring
- [ ] Create migration path from SQLite to PostgreSQL

## Definition of Done
- PostgreSQL connects reliably in production
- Automatic failover with data integrity
- Connection pool optimized for Railway
- Database status visible in health endpoint

## Relevant Files
- `main.py` (lines 83-100 - lifespan function)
- `.env.example` (add DATABASE_URL example)
- `railway.json` (check environment config)

**Time Estimate:** 1-2 days

title: 游 HIGH: Data Accuracy Issues - Validation Tests Failing
body:

## Test Results

- Database constraints: Not always enforced
- Real-time accuracy: Timestamp mismatches
- Data completeness: Potential data loss

## Critical Issues Found
1. Battery level can exceed 100% in database
2. WiFi signal strength validation incorrect
3. Timestamp inconsistencies between client/server
4. Session events may be duplicated
5. Device metrics missing required fields

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Strengthen Pydantic validation models
- [ ] Add database-level constraints
- [ ] Implement data deduplication
- [ ] Fix timezone handling
- [ ] Add data integrity checksums
- [ ] Create validation middleware

## Definition of Done
- 100% data accuracy test pass rate
- All invalid data rejected at API level
- Database constraints prevent bad data
- Timezone handling consistent
- Data integrity reports available

## Relevant Files

title: 游리 MEDIUM: Add Real-time WebSocket Support for Live Updates
body:
## Problem Description
Dashboard relies on polling for updates, causing delays and unnecessary server load. WebSocket support would enable real-time updates.

## Current Issues
- 30-second delay for new data
- High server load from polling
- Battery drain on viewing devices
- Missed critical alerts

## Proposed Solution
- WebSocket endpoint for live data
- Server-sent events fallback
- Selective updates (only changed data)
- Real-time alert push
- Connection status indicator

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement WebSocket endpoint
- [ ] Add real-time data streaming
- [ ] Update dashboard for WebSocket
- [ ] Add connection retry logic
- [ ] Implement data compression
- [ ] Add WebSocket monitoring

## Definition of Done
- Updates appear within 1 second
- 50% reduction in server load
- Graceful fallback to polling
- Connection status visible
- Works on all devices

## Relevant Files
- `main.py` (add WebSocket support)
- `static/dashboard_clean.html` (WebSocket client)
- New: `websocket_manager.py`
- Update: API documentation
